metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the lever (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup1_Lever_e2cbb1ea-7f8e-467a-9736-ce5f5b696299) to unlock the door to Prisoner Group 1, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Zumbo Pumbo
0.text: Aye, finally! Let's get a shimmy on, folks, there's not much time.

1.speaker: Zumbo Pumbo
1.text: Awe, shite - my legs are only wee, I don't know if I'll make it in time!
